title: Classic Croissant
description: A traditional French pastry, flaky and buttery.
ingredients: Flour, butter, sugar, yeast, milk, salt
steps: Prepare the dough and first fold.
Roll out and shape the croissants.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Chewy on the inside, crispy on the outside, loaded with chocolate chips.
ingredients: Flour, butter, brown sugar, white sugar, eggs, chocolate chips, vanilla extract, baking soda, salt
steps: Mix dry into wet, then fold in chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking sheet and bake.

title: Rustic Sourdough Bread
description: A crusty loaf with a tangy flavor, perfect for sandwiches or toast.
steps: Feed starter and let it become active.
Perform a series of stretch and folds.

title: Lemon Meringue Pie
description: A delightful pie with a tart lemon filling and a sweet, fluffy meringue topping.
ingredients: Pie crust, lemons, sugar, eggs, cornstarch, butter
steps: Prepare and blind bake the pie crust.
Make the lemon filling and pour into crust.
Prepare the meringue and pipe on top.

title: Cinnamon Rolls
description: Soft, fluffy rolls swirled with cinnamon sugar and topped with cream cheese frosting.
ingredients: Flour, milk, sugar, butter, yeast, eggs, cinnamon, brown sugar, cream cheese, powdered sugar
steps: Prepare the dough and let it rise.
Roll out dough, spread with filling.
Roll up and slice into rolls.

title: Blueberry Muffins
description: Moist and tender muffins packed with fresh blueberries.
ingredients: Flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, egg, melted butter, blueberries
steps: Preheat oven and prepare muffin tin.
Gently fold wet into dry, then add blueberries.
Spoon into muffin cups and bake.

title: French Baguette
description: The quintessential French bread, with a crisp crust and airy interior.
steps: Bulk ferment with a few folds.
Bake with steam for a crisp crust.

title: Red Velvet Cake
description: A classic southern cake with a distinctive red hue, chocolate flavor, and cream cheese frosting.
ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa powder, buttermilk, eggs, red food coloring, baking soda, cream cheese, butter, powdered sugar
steps: Prepare cake batter and divide into pans.
Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.

title: Almond Croissant
description: A twice-baked croissant filled with frangipane and topped with sliced almonds.
ingredients: Croissants, almond flour, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, sliced almonds
steps: Split croissants and soak with syrup.
Fill croissants and top with sliced almonds.

title: Focaccia Bread
description: An Italian flatbread, soft and airy, often topped with herbs and olive oil.
ingredients: Flour, water, yeast, olive oil, salt, rosemary
steps: Perform a series of stretch and folds.
Dimple the dough and add toppings.

title: New York Style Cheesecake
description: Rich, dense, and creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.
ingredients: Cream cheese, sugar, eggs, sour cream, vanilla extract, graham crackers, butter
steps: Prepare graham cracker crust and press into pan.
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs, sour cream, and vanilla.
Pour filling into crust and bake in a water bath.

title: Apple Crumble Bars
description: Sweet and tart apple filling layered between a buttery oat crumble.
ingredients: Flour, oats, brown sugar, butter, apples, cinnamon, lemon juice
steps: Prepare crumble mixture and press half into a pan.

title: Brioche Buns
description: Rich, tender, and slightly sweet buns, perfect for burgers or sandwiches.
ingredients: Flour, butter, milk, eggs, sugar, yeast, salt
steps: Prepare and knead the brioche dough.

title: Eclairs
description: Delicate choux pastry filled with pastry cream and topped with chocolate glaze.
ingredients: Water, butter, flour, eggs, milk, sugar, cornstarch, vanilla extract, chocolate, cream
steps: Prepare choux pastry and pipe onto baking sheet.
Make pastry cream and let cool.
Prepare chocolate glaze and dip eclairs.

title: Carrot Cake
description: Moist and flavorful cake with grated carrots, spices, and a luscious cream cheese frosting.
ingredients: Flour, sugar, carrots, eggs, vegetable oil, cinnamon, nutmeg, baking soda, cream cheese, butter, powdered sugar
steps: Combine wet ingredients for the cake.
Mix dry ingredients and add to wet.
Bake until a toothpick comes out clean.
Prepare cream cheese frosting and frost the cooled cake.
